## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description     | Type                                      | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignment`   | `alignment`    | Alignment       | `"is-centered" \| "is-right"`             | `undefined` |
| `class`       | `class`        | CSS Classes     | `string`                                  | `''`        |
| `isFullwidth` | `is-fullwidth` | Full width      | `boolean`                                 | `false`     |
| `isRounded`   | `is-rounded`   | Rounded         | `boolean`                                 | `false`     |
| `size`        | `size`         | Pagination size | `"is-large" \| "is-medium" \| "is-small"` | `undefined` |
| `tabStyle`    | `tab-style`    | Style           | `"is-boxed" \| "is-toggle"`               | `undefined` |
